title: Caitlyn bug ft. Lissandra
body:
I just played a normal game as Lissandra and fell victim to a 'law-defying' stunt from the enemy Caitlyn;

Upon finding an out of position Caitlyn traversing through river I immediately engaged on her, and once I felt she was low enough to die from an ult + Q combo, I decided to do so, however Caitlyn auto attacked me through my ultimate and killed me instead.

I know it's entirely possible for certain actions to be made in the wind-up of, and even the very premature animation stages of Lissandra's ultimate, but when Caitlyn's auto attack went through, it was what I'd estimate to be .5 seconds into the stun. I personally feel I have sufficient Lissandra experience to know for certain when a champion is locked down, but to vanquish any doubt in a readers mind; Caitlyn was completely incased in ice, the "ice tomb" effect had just begun and then she shot at me.

What makes this more curious, and I personally think it's the reason why this bug exists; is that the auto attack that went through was also a headshot proc, and I feel given the recent changes to her headshot, it makes sense that was the reasoning behind it.

This isn't a major bug by any means, but hopefully it's a quickfix that can be thrown into the next patch!

replies.body: Kalista had a bug where she'd keep auto-attacking while disabled, so this doesn't sound that farfetched. I suggest posting this over on the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board. If you happen to have video that'd be great.
